text: House of the Rising Sun is an action-thriller movie of 2011. This movie is about an ex-cop trying to turn his life around after five years in prison. Amy Smart plays Jenny. Danny Trejo plays Carlos. The movie was shot in Grand Rapids, Michigan. title: House of the Rising Sun
